name: Sonic 3D in 2D
description: Sonic 3D in 2D is a fangame that reimagines Sonic3D Blast plot and levels with style and structure closer to the games that preceeded it. Explore Flicky Island in a 2D side scrolling platformer that takes elements from the other Mega Drive/Genesis games to re-forge an adventure anew. Fight new and challenging bosses, save Flicky Island and stop Robotnik's final plan to harness the Flicky's power for himself.
notes:
This installer requires the following files from https://sotaknuck.itch.io/sonic3d2d
S3D2d 1.18 zip archive (If you choose another version you will need to edit the executable version number under Configure -> Game Options -> Executable.

files.sonic_game: N/A:Select S3D2d zip archive to install

content:
files:
- sonic_game: N/A:Select S3D2d zip archive to install
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/S3D2d/Sonic3D2d 1.18.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/S3D2d
    file: sonic_game
- task:
    app: vcrun6
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  d9vk: true
  dxvk: false
  esync: true
